synopsis.text: This is a tale of an unusual romance between Kei Kusanagi, a high school student with a unique condition that halted his growth, and Mizuho Kazami, an alien from the Galaxy Federation disguised as his teacher. Kei's life takes a dramatic turn when he stumbles upon Mizuho by the lake and discovers her true identity. To protect her secret, they are compelled to marry, leading to a series of comedic and romantic complications as they navigate through their secret marriage, school life, and the challenges posed by the Galaxy Federation. As they grow closer, their relationship evolves from a mere cover-up to a deep bond, creating a captivating love story between a human and an alien.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
